title: Lift to wake
summary: Turn on the screen when you pick up your phone.

title: Double tap to turn on screen
summary: Turn on the screen when you double tap it.

title: Double tap to turn off screen
summary: Double tap an empty space on the Home or Lock screen.

title: Palm touch to turn off screen
summary: Cover the screen with your palm to turn it off. This won't work while the keyboard is displayed.

title: Keep screen on while viewing
summary: Keep the screen on while you're looking at it, using the front camera to detect your face.

title: Shake to share
summary: Share pictures and videos by shaking your phone while a friend shakes theirs.

title: Palm swipe to capture
summary: Swipe the edge of your hand across the screen to take a screenshot.

title: Mute with gestures
summary: Mute incoming calls and alarms by putting your hand over the screen or turning your phone face down.

title: Accidental touch protection
summary: Protect your phone from accidental touches when it's in a dark place, such as a pocket or bag.

title: Suggest actions and replies for notifications
Dual Messenger
summary: Sign in to a second account in your favorite social apps.

title: Use Volume keys for media
summary: Control the media volume by default when you press the Volume keys.

title: Wi-Fi power saving mode
summary: Reduce battery usage by analyzing Wi-Fi traffic patterns.
